verses.text: Ask not to be excused, There's earnest work to do; Stand ready to be used, Ask not to be excused, The Master calls today; Too long hast thou re-fused, Ask not to be excused, There's danger in delay; That wondrous love a-bused.

Where God may station you. His invitation kind To thee has oft been giv'n; Now hast-en to be true, The harvest fields are white, The laborers are few; For-ev-er turns a-way. While Mercy gently pleads And points the way to heav'n.
Accept, and thou shalt find 'Tis sweet to work for Heav'n, Come, O come, Jesus the joy de-lights, The Master's work to do. to-day, While Jesus in-ter-cedes, O come and be for-giv'n.
Ask not to be excused, Come, O come today, Stand ready to be used.

chorus.text: Come, O come, The Master's work to do, to-day, While Jesus in-ter-cedes, O come and be for-giv'n.
